record.title: CONGRATULATING THE UNIVERSITY OF COLORADO AT BOULDER MEN'S CROSS COUNTRY TEAM

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the Senate now proceed to the consideration of S. Res. 232, submitted earlier today.

record.chair: The clerk will report the resolution by title.
record.narrative: There being no objection, the Senate proceeded to consider the resolution.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent the resolution be agreed to, the preamble be agreed to, and the motion to reconsider be laid on the table.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
